## ComponentStorage.getStats() method

获取存储统计信息

**Signature:**

```text
getStats(): {
        totalSlots&#58; number;
        usedSlots&#58; number;
        freeSlots&#58; number;
        fragmentation&#58; number;
    };
```
**Returns:**

{ totalSlots: number; usedSlots: number; freeSlots: number; fragmentation: number; }
